readable.title: 2869253972_aa72df6bf3
readable.content: A man holding the hand of another man who has a tattoo on his arm . A man that is standing up is holding the hand of another man that is sitting down . A man wearing a hat inspects the tattooed arm of another man . An elderly man is holding and looking at another man 's hand . An older gentleman in a brown cap looking at a younger gentleman 's arm .
